wikipedia_page.main: Richard Valentine Pitchford (24 November 1895 – 13 November 1973) was a master magician under the name Cardini, whose career spanned almost half a century. Born in Britain, he worked chiefly in the United States of America.

response: *Richard Valentine Pitchford alias "Cardini" (1895–1973), British master magician
Richard Valentine Pitchford (1895–1973) took over the Magicians' Guild after Hardeen's death. Sidney Hollis Radner received the Houdini collection from Hardeen.
*Richard Valentine Pitchford (aka Cardini), Master Magician, was born in Mumbles in 1895.
